thread.title_full: qBittorrent 3.2.4 BitTorrent Client Out Now with Fixes for Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: qBittorrent 3.2.4 BitTorrent Client Out Now with Fixes for Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows
text: The developers of the free, open-source and cross-platform qBittorrent P2P BitTorrent client announced on October 10 the immediate availability for download of what it appears to be the last maintenance release in the qBittorrent 3.2 series. According to the release notes attached below, qBittorrent 3.2.4 is mostly a bugfix release that addresses many of those annoying issues reported by users since the previous version of the software, qBittorrent 3.2.3, which was a very s...
